sent.orig: "Bless them, bless them! Long shall we bless them! [The] Ring-bearers, praise [them] to the height!"
sent.trans: 赞美他们，赞美他们！让我们长久地赞美他们！致以持戒者最崇高的赞美！

sent.orig: God bless you all, god bless we all, god bless Amkor!
sent.trans: 上帝保佑你们，上帝保佑我们，上帝保佑安靠！

sent.orig: God bless you, God bless the fallen, and God bless the United States of America.
sent.trans: 愿上帝保佑你们，保佑逝者，也保佑美国！

sent.orig: Bless them which persecute you: bless, and curse not.
sent.trans: 逼迫你们的，要给他们祝福。只要祝福，不可咒诅。

sent.orig: May God bless the people of Iraq, and may God bless America.
sent.trans: 愿上帝保佑伊拉克人民，愿上帝保佑美国。
